value.title: Zerg versus Protoss Early Game - StarCraft II Study
value.excerpt: So you want to win versus Protoss? Today we discuss the Zerg versus Protoss matchup in it's very basics. You need to be hitting between 40 and 44 supply at the 5:50 mark. Why? Because it's possible and it's relatively easy. Loads of StarCraft II players hit only about 30-35 supply, which is a difference
